install required packages and load them
```{r}
list.of.packages <- c("tidyverse", "raster", "summarytools")
new.packages <- list.of.packages[!(list.of.packages %in% installed.packages()[,"Package"])]
if(length(new.packages)) install.packages(new.packages)

library(raster)
library(summarytools)
library(tidyverse)

```

`temp` = raster layers from `GetEnv` stage
`polygon` = convex halls converted to polygons from `GeoRange` stage

```{r}
summary_gra <- raster::extract(x = temp, y = polygon) %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  na.omit() %>% 
  descr(.) %>%
  as.data.frame()

```
